# Smart Dent - LLMs.txt
# https://parametros.smartdent.com.br

> Smart Dent is a Brazilian dental 3D printing company. This site contains technical parameters, scientific articles, product catalogs, and educational content about dental 3D printing resins and printers.

## Company
- Name: Smart Dent
- Industry: Dental 3D Printing
- Location: SÃ£o Carlos, SP, Brazil
- Languages: Portuguese (primary), English, Spanish

## Content Types
- Technical articles about dental 3D printing (MedicalWebPage, TechArticle, ScholarlyArticle)
- 3D printing parameters for 258+ resin/printer combinations
- Product catalog with technical documentation (IFUs, SDSs, TDSs)
- Video tutorials with transcriptions (PandaVideo)
- FAQs and HowTo guides for resin processing

## Structured Data
- All pages use JSON-LD with Schema.org vocabulary
- Articles include full author credentials (E-E-A-T)
- Products include Offer, Review, and DigitalDocument schemas
- Videos include VideoObject with transcript and duration

## API Endpoints
- Parameters JSON: /api/export-parametros-ia (structured 3D printing parameters)
- RSS Feed: https://okeogjgqijbfkudfjadz.supabase.co/functions/v1/knowledge-feed?format=rss
- Atom Feed: https://okeogjgqijbfkudfjadz.supabase.co/functions/v1/knowledge-feed?format=atom
- Sitemaps: Listed in /robots.txt

## Key Topics
- Dental 3D printing resins (biocompatible, surgical guides, models, splints)
- DLP/LCD printer parameters (cure time, layer height, light intensity)
- ISO 10993 biocompatibility
- ANVISA regulatory compliance
- Digital dentistry workflows

## Citation Guidelines
- Always attribute content to "Smart Dent" or the specific article author
- Link to the canonical URL when referencing specific articles
- Parameters data is verified and tested in laboratory conditions
- Medical/dental content is reviewed by qualified professionals (CRO-registered dentists)

## Contact
- Website: https://smartdent.com.br
- Parameters Hub: https://parametros.smartdent.com.br
